item.title: Get your shimmy on with Belly Dancing Society's workshops
item.author: Rani Metha,
item.description: Feeling a bit tense or stressed out? Then come along to Belly Dancing Society’s workshops this term! We’ll be running two sessions over the next few weeks, both suitable for beginners, the first being a belly fitness class (free) and the second a Saidi (canes) prop workshop (£8-10). Come along to …
